author: Mavrrick
releaseNotes:
1.0.50 Tweaks to reduce load on hub restart
 Enhancements to main app to allow API Key update outside of device intialization
1.0.49 Added additional scenes for Outdoor Perm Lights
 1.0.48 Added additional scenes for Outdoor String Lights
 Enhancements for setNextEffect and setPreviousEffect
1.0.47 Correct bug in Light Drivers for scenes retrieval
 Added preloaded scenes for Govee Curtain Lights
1.0.46 Correct bug for found in DIY Retrieval for Device Driver
 Update to storage method for Scenes to improve performance and reliability
1.0.45 This change requires actions to be completed in the app to complete please review the post in the forums for full details
1.0.44 Enhanced scene extra parser to also handle Snapshots
 Corrected issue found with preloaded scenes for Perm outdoor lights
1.0.43 Added Manual device install process for Lan API only drivers
 Enabled the use of the integration for LAN API devices without obtaining a API Token
 Various UI changes to facilitate Lan API only install and validation of data needed
1.0.42 Added scenes for Christmas Tree String Lights
 Added validation for 3rd rule to prevent error
 Fixed issue with light driver when fade issued with CT change
1.0.41 Update fade process of driver
 Modify unschedule call from refresh method to only clear scheduled poll action
 Fix for RM Fade option that was passing incompatiable parm
1.0.40 Fix bug preventing state updates from reporting
 Fixed states to reflect change immediately
1.0.39 Extensive Code Optimizations
1.0.38 Support for new appliance devices added 
1.0.37 Added additional Trace Level Logging 
1.0.36 Enhanced method to identify devices already installed 
 1.0.35 Added Scenes for H601A, H601B, H6062 (Govee Light Bar Devices) 
 1.0.34 Added Scenes for H7061,H7062, H7060 (Govee Flood Light Devices) 
 Modified driver to validate device has scenes to load 
 Updated driver to use current level when using set color and no brightness is provided 
 Cleaned up some not needed scene extracts that just cause extra load 
 1.0.33 Bugfix to prevent extraction failures 
 added ability to recognize sleep tap to runs in Govee Home App  
 1.0.32 Reworked fade method to be more reliable 
 Added scenes to match Wiz Lighting  
 1.0.31 Added H619B, H619D, and H619Z to have preloaded scenes 
 Added option to clear token and reworked login process 
 Added option to customize Govee Oneclick group 
 Modified code to reject scenes that can not be extracted 
 1.0.30 Added H619A, H619C, and H619E to have preloaded scenes 
 1.0.29 Added custom menu for Scene management. 
 expanded the preloaded scenes as far as I could 
 Updated app to only load scenes for devices you own  
 1.0.28 All preloaded scenes for several devices that are derivatives of LED Strips  
 1.0.27 All preloaded scenes for H6072, H6065, and some new ones for H6066 devices 
 1.0.26 Rework how Scenes are managed 
 1.0.25 and 1.0.24 DIY Scene extraction enhancement 
 1.0.23 Govee Home login Improvements 
 1.0.22 Govee Scene handeling fixes 
 1.0.21 Added the ability to use Govee Scenes 
 1.0.20 Cloud APi attribute can be rest 
 1.0.19 API can now be updated if needed 
 1.0.18 Adjust handeling of Rate-Limits to prevent queueing of comands 
 1.0.17 Fixed Govee driver to better handle HSB color values 
 1.0.16 Update appliance drivers to include actuator capability for RM Integration 
 Updated pooling setup to allow for a value of 0 if no polling is needed 
 1.0.15 Found bug in Lighting drivers with reporting state and cleaned up comments in drivers 
 1.0.14 Added Notification for approaching rate limits for cloud API's.
 1.0.13 Corrected Pending status command location on driver. Corrected White Lite Driver detection.

drivers.name: Govee Lights, Plugs, and Switches Driver
Govee Appliance Driver with Lights and WhitenNoise
